    <p dir="RTL">لم تسجل أية إصابة جديدة بفيروس كورونا (كوفيد-19) ولا أي وفاة خلال الـ24 ساعة الأخيرة في الجزائر، فيما تماثل ثلاثة مرضى للشفاء، حسبما أفادت به اليوم الإثنين وزارة الصحة في بيان لها.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وبذلك، يبقى عدد الإصابات بالفيروس مستقرا عند 271198 حالة وعدد الوفيات عند 6881 حالة، فيما بلع مجموع المتماثلين للشفاء 182634 حالة.</p>

    description => string (1611) "<div class="FirstEle"> <p>India’s largest stock exchange, National Sto...
    $value[17]['description']
    <div class="FirstEle">
<p>India’s largest stock exchange, National Stock Exchange (NSE) wants to extend the trading hours in the equity segment.</p>
</div>
<div id="paywall_11676970657556" class="paywall">
<p>This is not the first time that the chatter around increasing trading hours has been in the air. In fact, the market regulator Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) allowed exchanges to extend their trading time way back in 2009.</p>
<p>Additionally, SEBI allowed extending trading time in equity derivatives contracts till almost midnight (from 9 am to 11:55 pm) in October 2018.</p>
<p>Now, as per a <em>Business Standard</em> report, NSE has now started consultation towards increasing market trading hours in the equity segments.</p>
<p>“Sebi has already allowed <a href="https://www.livemint.com/topic/equity-market" target="_blank" rel="noopener">equity market</a> timing to be extended to 9 am to 5 pm, maximum. In derivatives, they have allowed from 9 am to 11:55 pm. We have not moved forward. Now, we are working with our members and taking their feedback on what needs to be done," the Business Standard report quoted NSE's managing director and chief executive officer Ashishkumar Chauhan saying so.</p>
<p><strong>What is the current trading hour on NSE?</strong></p>
<p>Currently, for the cash segment on NSE and <a href="https://www.livemint.com/market/market-stats/stocks-bse-share-price-nse-bse-s0004751" target="_blank" rel="noopener">BSE</a> and the NSE F&O segment, the trading hours are 9:15 am to 3:30 pm.</p>
</div>

    <div class="f_L f_Q f_g">
<div class="f_z f_B f_T f_V f_5 f_8 f_bl f_bp f_y">
<div class="y_g">
<p>While the last two years have provided many challenges for Envato’s creative community, within these interesting times 2022 brought forward many causes for optimism. Through the pandemic, environmental catastrophe, and even war, our community has come together to support each other in simple and powerful ways. </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="f_L f_Q f_g">
<div class="f_z f_B f_T f_V f_5 f_8 f_bl f_bp f_y">
<div class="y_g">
<p>The results speak for themselves: new milestones in subscriber numbers and author earnings, a doubling down on Envato’s commitment to sustainability, and having a positive impact. </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="f_L f_Q f_g">
<div class="f_z f_B f_T f_V f_5 f_8 f_bl f_bp f_y">
<div class="y_g">
<p>Through it all, Envato has maintained an unwavering commitment to empowering creatives everywhere to thrive. Whether independently or as part of our global community, we believe in providing genuine opportunities to create, earn and grow, making creative success accessible and achievable for all.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="f_L f_Q f_g">
<div class="f_z f_B f_T f_V f_5 f_8 f_bl f_bp f_y">
<div class="y_g">
<p>This Envato Impact Statement is a testament to that, and all our community achieved in 2022. Please click through the deck below to view our highlights from the last 12 months.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

    description => UTF-8 string (815) "<p dir="RTL">أطلقت وزارة التجارة وترقية الصادرات، اليوم الإثنين، حملة تحسيسي...
    $value[20]['description']
    <p dir="RTL">أطلقت وزارة التجارة وترقية الصادرات، اليوم الإثنين، حملة تحسيسية وطنية حول المنتوجات التي تحمل رموز وألوان تمس بالعقيدة الدينية والقيم الأخلاقية للمجتمع الجزائري.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وأوضحت الوزارة في بيان لها عبر صفحتها الرسمية على "الفايسبوك"، أن هذه الحملة ستنظم بالتنسيق مع جمعيات حماية المستهلكين والتنظيمات المهنية والهيئات المعنية وهذا ابتداء من تاريخ 03 إلى 09 جانفي 2023.</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (6509) "<p dir="RTL">أعلن مجمع "صيدال", اليوم الاثنين, عن الانطلاق في انتاج الأنسولي...
    $value[21]['description']
    <p dir="RTL">أعلن مجمع "صيدال", اليوم الاثنين, عن الانطلاق في انتاج الأنسولين في الثلاثي الأول من عام 2023, تطبيقا لتوجيهات رئيس الجمهورية, السيد عبد المجيد تبون, خلال ترؤسه اجتماع مجلس الوزراء، أمس الأحد.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وأوضح المجمع في بيان له، انه "سيطلق إنتاج الأنسولين (المحاليل والحقن) في مصنع قسنطينة 1, بطاقة إنتاجية تبلغ مليون قارورة في السنة".</p>
<p dir="RTL">للإشارة أسدى الرئيس تبون خلال اجتماع مجلس الوزراء, تعليمات بضرورة إنتاج لقاح الأطفال والأنسولين بالجزائر بدءا من 2023 وكذا مكافحة تهريب الأدوية بكل أشكالها, وإلحاق أشد العقوبات بالمتورطين فيها.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وأكد المجمع أنه يتطلع في 2023, وبدعم من وزارة الصناعة الصيدلانية, "أن يرقى الى مستوى تطلعات رئيس الجمهورية, لا سيما تلك المتعلقة بتغطية السوق الوطنية وضمان توفير الأدوية للمواطن الجزائري بالإنتاج المحلي".</p>
<p dir="RTL">كما أسدى الرئيس تبون, خلال مجلس الوزراء, توجيهات بإعادة الاعتبار لمجمع "صيدال" للتكفل بتغطية جزء كبير من حاجيات السوق الوطنية للدواء "بعدما تقهقرت إلى 5 بالمائة, وهي التي كانت تحوز على حصة سوقية تقدر بـ 47 بالمائة", حسب بيان مجلس الوزراء.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وفي هذا السياق عرفت "صيدال" تطورا واضحا على مدى السنوات الثلاث الأخيرة, سواء من حيث رقم الأعمال وفي إثراء قائمة المنتجات (أكثر من 200 منتج موزع على  20 قسم علاجي), مما سيمكنه بالتأكيد, يضيف البيان, "من تحقيق الأهداف التي سطرتها الحكومة لهذه السنة".</p>
<p dir="RTL"> وأكد المجمع, في سياق متصل, أن هذا العام سيكون "أيضا عاما يركز على الصادرات, ولا سيما إلى البلدان الأفريقية مثل السنغال والبنين وموريتانيا وطوغو و ساحل الحاج وغيرها", وفقا للبيان.</p>
<p dir="RTL">               </p>
<p dir="RTL"><strong>العمل على إنشاء مشروع مشترك مع "سينوفاك" لإنتاج لقاحات أخرى</strong></p>
<p dir="RTL"> </p>
<p dir="RTL">ومن أجل تحقيق هذه الأهداف, يقول البيان, تقوم استراتيجية "صيدال" على ثلاثة محاور إنتاجية ذات قيمة مضافة عالية لصحة المواطن تقوم على انتاج الأنسولين والأدوية المضادة للسرطان و اللقاحات.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وأبرز المجمع, في هذا الشأن, أنه طبقا لتعليمات الرئيس تبون, انطلقت "صيدال" في إنتاج اللقاح المضاد لفيروس كورونا, في وقت قياسي (شهرين), بالشراكة مع المختبر الصيني "سينوفاك", مذكرا انه في 29 سبتمبر 2021, انطلق إنتاج اللقاح الذي يحمل اسم "كورونافاك" بمصنع قسنطينة 1 بقدرة انتاج تصل الي 96 مليون جرعة في السنة قبل توسيع الشراكة مع "سينوفاك" لانتاج لقحات موسومية مصنعة من طرف مجمع "صيدال".</p>
<p dir="RTL">وفي إطار استمرارية الشراكة مع "سينوفاك", أعلن المجمع أيضا أنه, "يجري العمل على إنشاء مشروع مشترك لإنتاج لقاحات أخرى".</p>
<p dir="RTL">وبخصوص إنتاج الأدوية المضادة للسرطان, تزود "صيدال", بالشراكة مع الشركة الكورية-الإندونيسية المتخصصة في إنتاج المنتجات المضادة للسرطان "سي كا دي أوتو فارما", المرضى الجزائريين بـ 06 أدوية موجهة للعلاج الكيماوي و 06 أدوية موجهة لمعالجة السرطان".</p>
<p dir="RTL"> </p>
<p dir="RTL"><strong>التصدير إلى 10 دول افريقية في 2023 و الاستثمار في الخارج</strong></p>
<p dir="RTL"> </p>
<p dir="RTL">وعلى صعيد اخر, أعلن المجمع أن "عام 2023 سيكون أيضا عاما للتصدير", حيث تهدف "صيدال" إلى ضمان توفير الأدوية لافريقيا, بتسجيل منتجاتها في أكثر من 10 دول أفريقية, و"يخطط المجمع حاليا للتصدير إلى دول أخرى مثل فنزويلا".</p>
<p dir="RTL">وذكر في هذا المجال توقيع عقدين في مايو 2022 في داكار للترويج لمنتجات "صيدال" في السنغال و في غينيا.</p>
<p dir="RTL"> وزيادة عن التصدير, تهدف "صيدال" إلى تطوير نشاطها "من خلال الاستثمار خارج التراب الجزائري في بلدان افريقية أخرى", وفق البيان.</p>
<p dir="RTL"> وبخصوص التوقعات الرئيسية لعام 2023, أوضح المجمع في بيانه أن رقم أعماله عرف ارتفاعا يقدر ب 78 بالمائة من 2021 الى 2022 وسيصل إلى 44 بالمائة في  2023 .</p>
<p dir="RTL">كما تطورت حصة الشركة في السوق من 3 بالمائة في سنة 2019 الى 9 بالمائة سنة  2022 وتتطلع -حسب البيان- الى مضاعفتها سنة 2024.</p>
<p dir="RTL">ويسعى مجمع "صيدال" لإثراء قائمة منتجاته بأدوية ذات قيمة مضافة عالية تتعلق بأدوية الأمراض المزمنة (داء السكري, أمراض القلب والأوعية الدموية), وإنتاج الأدوية الناتجة عن البيوتكنولوجيا, حسب البيان.</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (2485) "<p dir="RTL">أكد الرئيس التونسي، قيس سعيد، اليوم الاثنين، "مواصلة العملية ال...
    $value[22]['description']
    <p dir="RTL">أكد الرئيس التونسي، قيس سعيد، اليوم الاثنين، "مواصلة العملية الانتخابية إلى حين اختيار برلمان جديد للبلاد"، مشددا على أنه سيتم التصدي للمعارضين.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وقال سعيد، في كلمة خلال زيارته للمستشفى المحلي في محافظة جندوبة، إن "هناك مندسين من بين المترشحين وأطراف حاولت إفساد الانتخابات البرلمانية"، مضيفًا: "أن إمكانيّة سحب الوكالة من المندسين في الانتخابات واردة في نص الدستور"، حسب إذاعة "موزاييك إف إم".</p>
<p dir="RTL">وأكد أن "العملية الانتخابية ستتواصل حتى يقول الشعب كلمته، بالرغم من التجاوزات التي حصلت"، متهمًا "المعارضة بمحاولة إسقاط الدولة والعبث بقوت التونسيين عن طريق بث الإشاعات واختلاق الأزمات.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وأعلنت الهيئة العليا المستقلة للانتخابات في تونس، الأسبوع الماصي، أن نسبة المشاركة في الانتخابات التشريعية الأخيرة في البلاد بلغت 11.22%.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وقال رئيس الهيئة، فاروق بو عسكر، خلال مؤتمر صحفي في قصر المؤتمرات في العاصمة تونس، بأن "مليوناً و25 ألفًا و418 ناخبًا شاركوا في الانتخابات التشريعية التي أجريت السبت الماضي، أي بنسبة إقبال تقدر بحوالي 11.22 بالمئة".</p>
<p dir="RTL">ورحبت حركة "النهضة" المعارضة بضعف الإقبال على التصويت باعتباره مقاطعة لها.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وهذه أول انتخابات برلمانية تشهدها تونس منذ إعلان الرئيس قيس سعيد إجراءاته الاستثنائية في 25 جويلية 2021، التي تضمنت حينئذ تجميد عمل البرلمان ثم إعلان حله في وقت لاحق.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وتجرى هذه الانتخابات وسط مقاطعة عدة أحزاب، أبرزها حزب حركة النهضة التي كانت تسيطر على أكبر عدد من مقاعد البرلمان المنحل.</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (3005) "<p dir="RTL">أصدر مجلس قضاء سكيكدة مساء اليوم الإثنين حكمين بـ 8 و5 سنوات حب...
    $value[23]['description']
    <p dir="RTL">أصدر مجلس قضاء سكيكدة مساء اليوم الإثنين حكمين بـ 8 و5 سنوات حبسا نافذا في حق صاحب ملبنة وابنته بعد متابعتهما في قضية "المضاربة غير المشروعة في الحليب المدعم" وقد صدر حكم بـ 8 سنوات حبسا نافذا في حق المتهم الرئيسي صاحب الملبنة (ك.ر) المتواجد في حالة فرار و200 ألف دج غرامة مالية مع الأمر بالقبض عليه، في حين تم إصدار حكم بـ 5 سنوات حبسا نافذا لمسيرة الملبنة (ابنته) (ك.ع).</p>
<p dir="RTL">كما حكم بسنة حبس موقوفة التنفيذ على زوج المتهمة (ن.أ) الذي يشغل منصب رئيس المصلحة التقنية للملبنة وبغرامة مالية بـ100 ألف دج لتاجر (ج.ع).</p>
<p dir="RTL">وقد تمت متابعة 4 أشخاص في هذه القضية حيث يتعلق الأمر بكل من مالك الملبنة وهو حاليا في حالة فرار ومسيرة الملبنة بجنح "المضاربة غير المشروعة في مادة الحليب وممارسة تجارة تدليسية بإتلاف الوثائق التجارية وإخفائها وتزويرها قصد إخفاء الشروط الحقيقية للمعاملات التجارية وخداع المستهلك في التركيبة ونسبة المقومات اللازمة للمادة الغذائية".</p>
<p dir="RTL">في حين تمت متابعة كل من (ن. أ) بجنحتي "المشاركة في المضاربة غير المشروعة في مادة الحليب وممارسة تجارة تدليسية بإتلاف وإخفاء الوثائق التجارية قصد إخفاء الشروط الحقيقية للمعاملات التجارية" والمدعو (ج. ع) بجنحة "المضاربة غير المشروعة في مادة الحليب".</p>
<p dir="RTL">وتعود حيثيات القضية إلى شهر نوفمبر المنصرم إثر مباشرة تحقيق بعد استغلال معلومات مستقاة تفيد بتسويق تجار مادة الحليب المدعم والمنتج بأحد المصانع الخاصة بمنطقة النشاط حمروش حمودي (سكيكدة) بأسعار تفوق الأسعار المقننة.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وقد تم التنقل إلى الملبنة محل التحريات والقيام بعملية معاينة ميدانية حيث تم توقيف ثلاثة أشخاص ويتعلق الأمر بمسيرة الملبنة ورئيس المصلحة التقنية وتاجر فيما لا يزال المتهم الرابع وهو صاحب الملبنة في حالة فرار.</p>
<p dir="RTL">وكان ممثل الحق العام قد التمس تسليط عقوبة 10 سنوات حبسا نافذا و100 ألف دج غرامة للمتهمين.</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (5528) "<p class="">मदर डेयरी ने मंगलवार से दिल्ली-एनसीआर मार्केट में दूध की कीमतों ...
    $value[24]['description']
    <p class="">मदर डेयरी ने मंगलवार से दिल्ली-एनसीआर मार्केट में दूध की कीमतों में 2 रुपए प्रति लीटर की बढ़ोतरी करने का फैसला किया है। लागत में बढ़ोतरी का हवाला देते हुए दाम बढ़ाए जा रहे हैं। मदर डेयरी ने इस साल 5वीं बार दूध के दामों में बढ़ोतरी की है। दिल्ली-एनसीआर में ये कंपनी दूध की एक बड़ी सप्लायर है। ये रोजाना करीब 30 लाख लीटर दूध की सप्लाई करती है।</p>
<p class=""><strong>फुल क्रीम दूध अब 66 रुपए में मिलेगा</strong><br>मदर डेयरी ने फुल क्रीम दूध की कीमत दो रुपए बढ़ाकर 66 रुपए प्रति लीटर कर दी है, जबकि टोंड दूध की कीमत 51 रुपए से बढ़ाकर 53 रुपए प्रति लीटर कर दी गई है। डबल टोंड दूध की कीमत 45 रुपए से बढ़ाकर 47 रुपए प्रति लीटर कर दी गई है। मदर डेयरी ने गाय के दूध और टोकन (बल्क वेंडेड) दूध के प्रकारों की कीमतें नहीं बढ़ाई हैं।</p>
<p class=""><strong>कच्चे दूध की कीमत में 24% की बढ़ोतरी</strong><br>मदर डेयरी ने डेयरी किसानों से कच्चे दूध की कंपनी की खरीद लागत में इजाफे को कीमतों में बढ़ोतरी का जिम्मेदार ठहराया। कच्चे दूध की खरीद कीमतों में पिछले वर्ष की तुलना में लगभग 24% की बढ़ोतरी हुई है। दूध की कीमतों में बढ़ोतरी से घरेलू बजट प्रभावित होगा।</p>
<p class=""><strong>दाम बढ़ाने के लिए मजबूर</strong><br>मदर डेयरी ने कहा, 'कच्चे दूध की कीमतों में बढ़ोतरी का तनाव पूरे इंडस्ट्री में महसूस किया जा रहा है, जो उपभोक्ता कीमतों पर दबाव डाल रहा है। किसानों को सही कीमतों का भुगतान जारी रखने की हमारी प्रतिबद्धता में, हम दूध के चुनिंदा प्रकारों के प्राइस को संशोधित करने के लिए विवश हैं। दिल्ली NCR में 27 दिसंबर 2022 से नई कीमतें प्रभावी होंगी।'</p>
<p class=""><strong>पिछली बार 21 नवंबर को बढ़े थे दाम</strong><br>कंपनी ने इस साल कीमतों में कई बार बढ़ोतरी की है। पिछली बार बढ़ोतरी 21 नवंबर को हुई थी, जब उसने दिल्ली-एनसीआर के बाजार में फुल क्रीम दूध की कीमतों में 1 रुपए प्रति लीटर और टोकन मिल्क में 2 रुपए प्रति लीटर की बढ़ोतरी की थी। इससे पहले, मदर डेयरी ने अक्टूबर में दिल्ली-एनसीआर और उत्तर भारत के कुछ अन्य बाजारों में फुल क्रीम दूध और गाय के दूध की कीमतों में 2 रुपये प्रति लीटर की बढ़ोतरी की थी।</p>
<p class=""><strong>मदर डेयरी और अमूल लीडिंग ब्रांड</strong><br>मदर डेयरी दिल्ली-NCR मार्केट में लीडिंग मिल्क सप्लायर में से एक है और प्रति दिन 30 लाख लीटर से ज्यादा दूध पॉली पैक और वेंडिंग मशीनों के माध्यम से बेचती है। वहीं अमूल भी देश का लीडिंग ब्रांड है जिसके मालिक लाखों किसान हैं। गुजरात के दो गांवों से 75 साल पहले 247 लीटर दूध से शुरू हुआ यह सफर आज 260 लाख लीटर पर पहुंच गया है।</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (3948) "<p class="">सेंटर फॉर इकोनॉमिक्स एंड बिजनेस रिसर्च के अनुसार, दुनिया को 2023...
    $value[25]['description']
    <p class="">सेंटर फॉर इकोनॉमिक्स एंड बिजनेस रिसर्च के अनुसार, दुनिया को 2023 में मंदी का सामना करना पड़ेगा। ग्लोबल इकोनॉमी 2022 में पहली बार 100 ट्रिलियन डॉलर को पार कर गई, लेकिन 2023 में ठप हो सकती है।</p>
<p class="">CBIR में डायरेक्टर और फोरकास्टिंग हेड केए डेनियल नेउफेल्ड ने कहा, 'इस बात की संभावना है कि बढ़ी महंगाई के जवाब में ब्याज दरों में बढ़ोतरी के कारण वर्ल्ड इकोनॉमी को अगले साल मंदी का सामना करना पड़ेगा। महंगाई के खिलाफ लड़ाई अभी जीती नहीं है।'</p>
<p class=""><strong>भारत 2035 तक तीसरी सबसे बड़ी इकोनॉमी</strong><br>भारत 2035 में 10 ट्रिलियन डॉलर की तीसरी और 2032 तक दुनिया की तीसरी सबसे बड़ी इकोनॉमी बन जाएगा। वहीं चीन को अब दुनिया की सबसे बड़ी इकोनॉमी बनने में 6 साल ज्यादा लगेंगे। पहले इसके 2036 तक सबसे बड़ी इकोनॉमी बनने की उम्मीद थी, लेकिन अब इसमें 2042 तक का समय लग सकता है। रिपोर्ट के अनुसार चीन की जीरो कोविड पॉलिसी और पश्चिमी देशों के साथ व्यापारिक तनाव के कारण उसका विकास धीमा पड़ गया है।</p>
<p class=""><strong>दुनिया की GDP 2037 तक दोगुनी हो जाएगी</strong><br>रिपोर्ट में ये भी कहा गया है कि 2037 तक दुनिया की GDP दोगुनी हो जाएगी, क्योंकि डेवलपिंग इकोनॉमीज अमीरों के बराबर हो जाएंगी। शक्ति के बदलते संतुलन से 2037 तक पूर्वी एशिया और प्रशांत क्षेत्र का ग्लोबल आउटपुट में एक तिहाई से ज्यादा का योगदान होगा, जबकि यूरोप का हिस्सा पांचवे से भी कम हो जाएगा।</p>
<p class=""><strong>मंदी और जॉब का कनेक्शन</strong><br>मंदी की शुरुआत में, जैसे-जैसे कंपनियां कम मांग, घटते मुनाफे और ऊंचे कर्ज का सामना करती हैं, कई कंपनिया कॉस्ट कटिंग करने के लिए इम्पलॉइज की छंटनी शुरू कर देती हैं। बढ़ती बेरोजगारी कई संकेतकों में से एक है जो मंदी को परिभाषित करती है। मंदी में कंज्यूमर कम खर्च करते हैं और इंडस्ट्रियल प्रोडक्शन भी धीमा हो जाता है।</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (4134) "<p class="">ICICI बैंक लोन फ्रॉड मामले में मुंबई की स्पेशल कोर्ट ने वीडियोकॉ...
    $value[26]['description']
    <p class="">ICICI बैंक लोन फ्रॉड मामले में मुंबई की स्पेशल कोर्ट ने वीडियोकॉन ग्रुप के फाउंडर वेणुगोपाल धूत, ICICI बैंक की पूर्व CEO और MD चंदा कोचर और उनके पति दीपक कोचर को 28 तारीख तक की CBI कस्टडी में भेज दिया है। वेणुगोपाल धूत को आज ही गिराफ्तार किया था।</p>
<p class="">इससे पहले एजेंसी ने शुक्रवार को चंदा कोचर और दीपक कोचर को अरेस्ट किया था। इसके बाद उन्हें कोर्ट ने 3 दिन (24 से 26 दिसंबर) तक कस्टडी में भेज दिया था। अब उनकी कस्टडी को बुधवार तक बढ़ा दिया गया है। CBI के वकील ने कहा कि उन्होंने कस्टडी मांगी है क्योंकि वे उन सभी का सामना कराना चाहते हैं।</p>
<p class=""><strong>नियमों को ताक पर रखकर लोन दिया</strong><br>आरोप है कि जब चंदा कोचर ने देश के बड़े प्राइवेट बैंकों में से एक ICICI बैंक की कमान संभाली तो वीडियोकॉन की विभिन्न कंपनियों के नियमों को ताक पर रखकर कुछ लोन मंजूर किए। 2012 में वीडियोकॉन ग्रुप की कंपनियों के 6 अकाउंट के मौजूदा बकाया को डोमेस्टिक डेब्ट रिफाइनेंसिंग के तहत स्वीकृत 1,730 करोड़ रुपए के लोन में एडजस्ट किया था।</p>
<p class="">वहीं CBI ने ये भी बताया था कि 2012 में दिए गए 3250 करोड़ के लोन में से 2810 करोड़ रुपए (लगभग 86%) नहीं चुकाए। वीडियोकॉन और उसकी ग्रुप कंपनियों के अकाउंट को जून 2017 में NPA घोषित कर दिया गया था। NPA घोषित होने से बैंक को घाटा हुआ।</p>
<p class=""><strong>वकील ने पूछा था धूत को अरेस्ट क्यों नहीं किया?</strong><br>चंदा कोचर के वकील ने शनिवार को कोर्ट में कहा था कि चंदा ऐसी किसी भी कंपनी में डायरेक्टर या स्टेकहोल्डर नहीं थीं, जिसे लोन दिए गए थे। यह बयान ED को स्वीकार्य था और ED ने उन्हें गिरफ्तार नहीं किया, लेकिन CBI इस बयान से संतुष्ट नहीं हुई और गिरफ्तारी की गई। वकील ने कहा था कि इन लोन्स के लाभार्थी वीएन धूत हैं। उन्होंने सवाल किया, 'अगर CBI को लगता है कि फ्रॉड हुआ तो कोचर को ही क्यों गिरफ्तार किया गया, लाभार्थी को क्यों नहीं।'</p>
<p class=""><strong>समझें पूरा मामला...</strong></p>

    description => UTF-8 string (3220) "<p class="">मारुति सुजुकी ने अपनी प्रीमियम हैचबैक कार बलेनो (Baleno) के फीचर...
    $value[27]['description']
    <p class="">मारुति सुजुकी ने अपनी प्रीमियम हैचबैक कार बलेनो (Baleno) के फीचर्स को अपडेट किया है। अब इस कार के 9 इंच के स्मार्टप्ले प्रो प्लस सिस्टम में वायरलेस एप्पल कार प्ले और एंड्रॉइड ऑटो का सपोर्ट मिलेगा। कंपनी ने सोमवार को इसकी जानकारी दी।</p>
<p class="">मारुति ने बलेनो के फेसलिफ्ट को इस साल नए लुक और फीचर के साथ फरवरी में लॉन्च किया था। तब से बिक्री के मामले में ये कार भारत में टॉप-10 में बनी हुई है। नवंबर में लगभग 21 हजार युनिट की बिक्री के साथ बलेनो नंबर वन की पॉजीशन पर थी।</p>
<p class=""><strong>इंस्ट्रुमेंट क्लस्टर और HUD पर टर्न-बाय-टर्न दिखेगा नेविगेशन</strong><br>सॉफ्टवेयर अपडेट के बाद बलेनो में अब ऑटो कनेक्टिविटी मिलेगी। इससे हेंड्स-अप डिस्प्ले (HUD) और इंस्ट्रुमेंट क्लस्टर में मल्टी इंफाइंफोर्मेशन डिस्प्ले पर टर्न बाय टर्न नेविगेशन मिल पाएगा। कस्टमर नए फीचर्स को डीलरशिप पर जाकर अपडेट करवा सकते हैं।</p>
<p class="">फिलहाल ये फीचर सिर्फ जेटा और अल्फा वैरिएंट में अवेलेबल हैं। मारुति ने ये फीचर कार की लॉन्चिंग के समय फ्यूचर यूज के लिए रिजर्व किए थे, जो अब अनलॉक कर दिए गए हैं। इस फीचर के शुरू होने के बाद अब बलेनो ने कनेक्टिंग कार के सेगमेंट में भी एंट्री कर ली है।</p>
<p class="">मारुति अपने पोर्टफोलियो को लगातार अपडेट कर रही है। कंपनी ने हाल ही में ब्रेजा, अर्टिगा, वैगन आर और डिजायर को अपडेट किया है। मीडिया रिपोर्ट्स के मुताबिक, कंपनी एसयूवी XL6 में भी ये फीचर जल्द देने वाली है।</p>

    description => UTF-8 string (4077) "<p class="">साल 2022 खत्म होने में अब कुछ ही दिन बचे हैं और नया साल 2023 शुर...
    $value[28]['description']
    <p class="">साल 2022 खत्म होने में अब कुछ ही दिन बचे हैं और नया साल 2023 शुरू होने वाला है। इस नए साल की शुरुआत छुट्टी के साथ होगी। साल के पहले महीने में अलग-अलग राज्यों व शहरों में कुल 11 दिन बैंक बंद रहेंगे।</p>
<p class=""><strong>रविवार से शुरू होगा साल</strong><br>साल के पहले महीने यानी जनवरी की शुरुआत छुट्‌टी से होगी। 1 जनवरी को इस बार रविवार पड़ रहा है। वहीं जनवरी महीने में अलग-अलग राज्यों और शहरों में 2, 3, 4 और 26 तारीख को बैंकों में छुट्टी रहेगी, जबकि 1, 7, 8, 15 21, 22 और 29 जनवरी को रविवार और दूसरे-चौथे शनिवार के साप्ताहिक अवकाश हैं।</p>
<p class="">ऐसे में अगर आपको अगले महीने बैंक से जुड़ा कोई जरूरी काम हो तो इन छुट्टियों के दिनों को छोड़कर आप बैंक जा सकते हैं। ऐसे में यहां देखें जनवरी महीने में आपके राज्य और शहर में बैंक कब-कब बंद रहेंगे...</p>
<p class=""><strong>नोट:</strong> इसके अलावा अलग-अलग शहरों में विभिन्न कारणों के चलते बैंक बंद रहेंगे।<strong> </strong></p>
<p class=""><strong>ऑनलाइन बैंकिंग से जरिए निपटा सकेंगे काम</strong><br>आप बैंकों की छुट्टी के बावजूद ऑनलाइन बैंकिंग और ATM के जरिए पैसे की लेनदेन या अन्य काम कर सकते हैं। इस सुविधाओं पर बैंकों की छुट्टियों का कोई असर नहीं पड़ेगा।</p>
<p class=""><strong><em>ये खबरें भी पढ़े</em></strong></p>
<p class=""><strong>इनकम टैक्स रिटर्न भरने का आखिरी मौका: FY22 के लिए 31 दिसंबर तक फाइल कर सकते हैं बिलेटेड ITR</strong><br>वित्त वर्ष 2021-22 के लिए इनकम टैक्स रिटर्न फाइल करने की आखिरी तारीख 31 जुलाई निकल चुकी है। लेकिन बहुत सारे लोग ऐसे हैं जो ITR नहीं भर पाए हैं। अगर आपने भी अभी तक नहीं भरा है तो लेट फीस (बिलेटेड ITR) के साथ 31 दिसंबर 2022 तक ITR भर सकते हैं।</p>
<p class="">अगर आप इनकम टैक्स रिटर्न फाइल करने के दायरे में आते हैं, और आप 31 दिसंबर तक ITR फाइल नहीं करते हैं तो इनकम टैक्स डिपार्टमेंट आपको नोटिस जारी कर सकता है। ऐसे में परेशानी से बचने के लिए आपको 31 दिसंबर तक ITR फाइल कर देना चाहिए। </p>

    description => string (9060) "<div class="pg-rail-tall__head js-pg-rail-tall__head"> <section id="large-me...
    $value[29]['description']
    <div class="pg-rail-tall__head js-pg-rail-tall__head">
<section id="large-media" class="zn zn-large-media zn-body zn--idx-0 zn--ordinary zn-has-one-container" data-eq-pts="xsmall: 0, medium: 460, large: 780, full16x9: 1100" data-vr-zone="zone-0-0" data-zone-label="headerMedia" data-containers="1" data-zn-id="large-media" data-eq-state="xsmall medium large">
<div class="l-container">
<div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title">
<div class="element-raw appearance-standard">Las Vegas Raiders quarterback Jarrett Stidham celebrates with tight end Jacob Hollister after scrambling for a touchdown during the first half against the Jacksonville Jaguars.</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>
<div class="pg-rail-tall__body">
<section id="body-text" class="zn zn-body-text zn-body zn--idx-0 zn--ordinary zn-has-multiple-containers zn-has-27-containers" data-eq-pts="xsmall: 0, medium: 460, large: 780, full16x9: 1100" data-vr-zone="zone-1-0" data-zone-label="bodyText" data-containers="27" data-zn-id="body-text" data-eq-state="xsmall medium large">
<div class="l-container">
<div class="el__leafmedia el__leafmedia--sourced-paragraph">
<p class="zn-body__paragraph speakable" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_D16D3AEB-6DAD-F1B6-2B34-6D45AAFBCCA2"><cite class="el-editorial-source">(CNN)</cite>After nearly six long months away, the <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2022/08/03/sport/deshaun-watson-tony-buzbee-suspension-spt-intl/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">NFL</a> is back.</p>
</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_0B195E56-4A89-C73E-412D-6D466CA1D421">The 2022 <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2022/08/02/us/nfl-miami-dolphins-suspend/index.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">season's</a> preseason began on Thursday with the typical curtain raiser at the Hall of Fame game, signaling the beginning of another season of drama, excitement and the highest level of skill imaginable.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_C9098CAC-25B2-59A2-2CBF-6D466CA3D1B3">And it was the perfect start to life in a new home for Josh McDaniels, the Las Vegas Raiders' new head coach who joined in January after a long, trophy-laden spell with the New England Patriots.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_B7ABF742-2F4B-A3C8-E51F-6D466CA4F1FE">His Raiders thumped the Jacksonville Jaguars 27-11, spoiling first-year Jaguars head coach Doug Pederson's debut game at the helm.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_A7BCAA08-ECA7-14A2-CF88-6D466CA573A5">It was a homecoming win for Jacksonville native McDaniels, who was returning to the Tom Benson Hall of Fame Stadium where he once played for Canton McKinley High School, patrolling the sidelines he watched his father, Thom McDaniels, coach on for nearly two decades.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_A7BCAA08-ECA7-14A2-CF88-6D466CA573A5"> </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_A7BCAA08-ECA7-14A2-CF88-6D466CA573A5"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1659697647.7892.jpg" alt="" width="780" height="438"></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_A7BCAA08-ECA7-14A2-CF88-6D466CA573A5">
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--fullwidth">
<div class="el__image--fullwidth js__image--fullwidth">
<div>
<div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title">
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth"> </div>
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Josh McDaniels looks on during the first half against the Jacksonville Jaguars.</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_719F10F4-A076-5EFD-ECD9-6D4B0E34F2C0">"Very grateful that I had (the chance)," McDaniels <a href="https://www.raiders.com/news/raiders-cap-coach-mcdaniels-homecoming-with-hall-of-fame-game-win" target="_blank" rel="noopener">said</a> afterward. "It's the first time I've been in this Hall of Fame Game in 22 years. To have an opportunity to do that with him here and my family and plenty of people that helped me along the way, I think it was a special night for them.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_2F48ECA0-A057-E4AB-B20F-6D466CA62F5D">"You never know if you'll get this opportunity again. I really savored it. It was a good opportunity for all of us, and I think we all enjoyed it."</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_4434DE9A-308A-C8C5-DC9C-6D466CA7954E">In a game without most of both teams' starters -- Raiders quarterback Derek Carr and star wide receiver Davante Adams sat out while the Jaguars released a list of 21 players who wouldn't be playing including second year quarterback, Trevor Lawrence -- it was up to the more fringe players to step up.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F066F9B8-92E3-3115-791F-6D466CA8BF25">And like many preseason games without the star players, it wasn't the most polished affair.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F066F9B8-92E3-3115-791F-6D466CA8BF25"> </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F066F9B8-92E3-3115-791F-6D466CA8BF25"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1659697724.5124.jpg" alt="" width="780" height="438"></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F066F9B8-92E3-3115-791F-6D466CA8BF25">
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--fullwidth">
<div class="el__image--fullwidth js__image--fullwidth">
<div>
<div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title">
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth"> </div>
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Snoop Conner is tackled by Kendal Vickers, Andrew Billings and Tashawn Bower.</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_3C2B703A-E664-FBB7-E2C6-6D4A5CDC38CF">No. 1 overall pick in this year's draft Travon Walker was called for a roughing-the-passer penalty against Raiders backup quarterback Jarrett Stidham on the very first play from scrimmage. Walker did display why he was picked first though as he picked up a sack later in the game.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F43C9054-E378-8D81-2E89-6D466CAAA098">There were opportunities for players to flash though, as rookie running-back Zamir White showed, rushing for 52 yards and adding 23 more through the air.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_68F6BA80-0932-7067-7B49-6D466CAB4EE2">And it was the Raiders' rushing attack which really tore through the Jaguars defense, finishing the game with 159 yards total rushing and three rushing touchdowns; one each from Stidham, Austin Walter and Ameer Abdullah.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_E202C5E0-36CC-0BB0-1728-6D466CABBE53">Raiders kicker Daniel Carlson was perfect from the field too, adding two field goals and three extra-points.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F00D10C6-7288-68BC-0045-6D466CAB6891">Jaguars running-back Nathan Cottrell scored his team's only touchdown of the evening, catching a pass from Kyle Sloter in the endzone.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F00D10C6-7288-68BC-0045-6D466CAB6891"> </div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F00D10C6-7288-68BC-0045-6D466CAB6891"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1659697746.9814.jpg" alt=""></div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_F00D10C6-7288-68BC-0045-6D466CAB6891">
<div class="el__embedded el__embedded--fullwidth">
<div class="el__image--fullwidth js__image--fullwidth">
<div>
<div class="media__caption el__gallery_image-title">
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth"> </div>
<div class="element-raw appearance-fullwidth">Josh Thompson extends to convert a third down as he is forced out of bounds by Sam Webb during the first half.</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_35A5A4E0-3AB1-AF6A-E4BA-6D466CAB1720">After the game, Pederson praised the effort of his team which was missing many of its starters.</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_63F58B0E-AF65-1CE3-F290-6D466CABDBCA">"I thought overall the effort was outstanding," Pederson <a href="https://www.jaguars.com/news/jaguars-game-report-raiders-27-jaguars-11" target="_blank" rel="noopener">said</a>. "We just have to clean up. There were too many little mistakes."</div>
<div class="zn-body__paragraph" data-paragraph-id="paragraph_D0429008-8B3A-D641-3A1D-6D466CAB3279">He added: "We made sure everybody played in this game. As we move forward, it will be a little more the starters and guys we think will be on the 53(-player roster) as we go."</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</section>
</div>

    <h2 class="synopsis">Google Pixel 6a review: The Pixel series marks a return to India and as always, the focus is on software.</h2>
<p>I have never used or reviewed a <a class="" href="https://indianexpress.com/about/google/">Google</a> Pixel phone till now. So when the opportunity came to review the new Google Pixel 6a, which is actually coming to India this time, I wanted to take this phone for a spin. My objectives were two: one, figure out why the camera was getting so much attention and praise and, two, check out Google’s own vision of <a class="" href="https://indianexpress.com/about/android/">Android</a>.</p>

    description => string (4050) "<p>Apple has just released new iPhone 13 models, but the company has already...
    $value[31]['description']
    <p>Apple has just released new iPhone 13 models, but the company has already been working on iPhone 14. While <em>9to5Mac</em> sources corroborated a report about the new models having different chips, we also learned that the iPhone 14 Pro models may have a taller screen due to the new design and that Apple has still been working on satellite features.</p>
<p><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1659696968.4509.jpg" alt=""></p>
<p><span id="more-793059"></span></p>
<h2 id="h-iphone-14-details">iPhone 14 details</h2>
<p>Early iPhone 14 rumors suggested that Apple’s smartphone lineup in 2022 will have four new models but this time <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/04/14/kuo-iphone-14-lineup-in-2022-will-not-include-5-4-inch-mini-size/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">without a “mini” version</a>. According to our sources, the new iPhone 14 (codenamed D27 and D28) will be available in 6.1-inch and 6.7-inch versions, and the current 5.4-inch iPhone mini form-factor will be discontinued.</p>
<p>These mid-range phones will have the same display resolution as the current iPhone 13 Pro and iPhone 13 Pro Max. However, the display on the flagships iPhones 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max (codenamed D73 and D74) may be slightly taller to accommodate the <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/02/26/iphone-14-design-schematic-notch-leaked/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">new “notch + pill” design</a> that will replace the notch.</p>
<p>As for the chip situation, <em>9to5Mac’s</em> sources confirm that there will be <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/03/13/kuo-a16-iphone-14-pro-models/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">two new iPhone 14 models based on the A15 chip</a>, while two others will have a brand new chip. It’s worth noting that Apple currently has two different versions of the A15 chip, one of which has an extra GPU core and 6GB of RAM (used in 13 Pro models).</p>
<p>Apple could use the high-end version of its A15 Bionic chip in the entry-level iPhone 14 models, as <em>9to5Mac</em> also heard from our own sources that all this year’s iPhones will have 6GB of RAM. The company could even rebrand the chip as “A15X,” as it has done in the past with the 2020 iPad Pro’s A12Z chip – which is essentially the A12X chip with an extra GPU core.</p>
<p>As another example, the <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/09/14/apple-watch-series-7-has-the-same-processor-as-last-years-apple-watch-series-6/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">Apple Watch Series 7 has the same CPU as the Apple Watch Series 6</a>, but the chips are named “Apple S6” and “Apple S7” due to minor internal changes that have been made to the SoC.</p>
<h2 id="h-satellite-features">Satellite features</h2>
<p>A few weeks before the iPhone 13 announcement, <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/08/29/kuo-iphone-13-to-support-leo-satellite-communication-allowing-users-to-make-phone-calls-and-send-texts-without-cell-signal/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">some reports suggested</a> that Apple had been working on satellite communication features for upcoming iPhone models. Although these features were never added to the iPhone 13 lineup, <em>9to5Mac’s</em> sources told us that Apple is still working on satellite communication for iPhone.</p>
<p>It’s unclear whether the technology will be ready for this year’s iPhone, but the company has been testing prototypes that are capable of sending text messages over satellite. That system is internally known by the codename “Stewie.”</p>
<p>Both iPhone 14 and 14 Pro are expected to be introduced this fall. Be sure to check out our <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/01/25/iphone-14-features-roundup/" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">guide with everything we know so far</a> about Apple’s next generation smartphone.</p>

    description => string (6758) "<p>The <a href="https://9to5mac.com/guides/apple-watch-series-8/">Apple...
    $value[32]['description']
    <p>The <a href="https://9to5mac.com/guides/apple-watch-series-8/">Apple Watch Series 8</a> release date is around the corner and this year we could see a new rugged “Pro” version with a larger screen join the lineup, and fresh health features. Apple Watch Series 8 will likely be available to pre-order in just a matter of weeks. Head below for what to expect on a release date, new features, and more.</p>
<h2 id="h-apple-watch-launches-over-the-years">Apple Watch launches over the years</h2>
<p>Outside of the original Apple Watch arriving in April 2015, Apple has unveiled every hardware update to its wearable in September. Apple traditionally announces the new <a href="https://amzn.to/3ymevVf">Apple Watch</a> models along with the <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/07/03/iphone-14-release-date-news/">fall iPhone event</a>. One exception to that was 2020 when Apple Watch 6 and SE were unveiled in September and iPhone 12 was announced in October.</p>
<ul>
<li>Apple Watch Series 7: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/09/14/apple-watch-series-7-debut/">announced</a> <strong>September 14, 2021</strong>, <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/10/14/first-apple-watch-series-7-orders-arriving-to-customers-around-the-world/">launched</a> October 15, 2021</li>
<li>Apple Watch Series 6 and SE: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2020/09/15/apple-officially-announces-apple-watch-series-6-with-new-colors-and-more/">announced</a> <strong>September 15, 2020</strong></li>
<li>Apple Watch Series 5: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2019/09/10/apple-unveils-apple-watch-series-5-with-always-on-display/">announced</a> <strong>September 10, 2019</strong></li>
<li>Apple Watch Series 4: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2018/09/12/apple-watch-series-4-announced-release-price/">announced</a> <strong>September 12, 2018</strong></li>
<li>Apple Watch Series 3: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2017/09/13/apple-watch-series-3-impressions/">announced</a> <strong>September 12, 2017</strong></li>
<li>Apple Watch Series 1 and 2: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2016/09/07/apple-iphone-7-event-live-blog-news-hub/">announced</a> <strong>September 7, 2016</strong></li>
<li>Original Apple Watch: <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2015/04/10/apple-watch-macbook-launch/">launched</a> <strong>April 10, 2015</strong></li>
</ul>
<h2>Apple Watch Series 8 release date</h2>
<p>Apple has a strong history of holding its iPhone and Apple Watch events on the first or second Tuesday in September.</p>
<p>But with Labor Day falling on Monday, September 5 this year, the Apple Watch Series 8 release date is most likely <strong>September 13</strong> – that is if there aren’t any unexpected delays.</p>
<p><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1659696531.9543.jpg" alt="" width="2510" height="1408"></p>
<p>While Apple could announce Apple Watch Series 8 alongside <a href="https://9to5mac.com/guides/iphone-14/">iPhone 14</a> on September 13, it’s difficult to know how fast Apple will open up pre-orders for the wearable.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/07/03/iphone-14-release-date-news/">iPhone 14 release date news: Here are the latest details</a></li>
</ul>
<p>With Apple Watch Series 7, pre-orders came about a month after the product was announced, but with Series 6, orders were available immediately. We’ll have to wait and see what happens with Apple Watch Series 8 availability.</p>
<h2>What we know about Apple Watch Series 8</h2>
<p>Of course, Apple Watch Series 8 will come with Apple’s newest software, <a href="https://9to5mac.com/guides/watchos-9/">watchOS 9</a>. That brings features like new and updated watch faces, brand-new running metrics in the Workout app, and improved sleep tracking.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/06/07/watchos-9-the-new-apple-watch-faces/">watchOS 9 hands-on: new and updated Apple Watch faces</a></li>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/06/17/apple-watch-running-metrics-watchos-9/">Apple Watch running metrics: Hands-on with new Workout features in watchOS 9</a></li>
</ul>
<p>But there are a number of Series 8-specific hardware upgrades we could see. First, Apple Watch Series 8 could land with the largest screen yet and additional features may include the ability to read body temperature.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/07/04/apple-watch-series-8-bigger-display-50-mm/">Report: Apple Watch Series 8 to feature bigger display</a></li>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/07/03/apple-watch-series-8-body-temperature-sensor/">Gurman: Apple Watch Series 8 to feature body temperature sensor</a></li>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/guides/apple-watch-series-8/">Apple Watch Series 8: Everything we know so far</a></li>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/07/09/four-features-we-expect-to-see-on-apple-watch-series-8/">Four features we expect to see on Apple Watch Series 8</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>Rugged “Apple Watch Pro”</h3>
<p>It’s looking like the launch of a rugged Apple Watch Pro model will happen this fall and that larger screen and more durable construction will be exclusive features. We heard a report from <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/03/26/bloomberg-apple-considering-new-apple-watch-model-with-rugged-casing-aimed-at-athletes/">Bloomberg say Apple was exploring this</a> and reliable Apple analyst <a href="https://9to5mac.com/2021/12/08/kuo-airpods-pro-apple-watch-8/">Ming-Chi Kuo has predicted</a> we could see three Apple Watch models launch this fall – including the rugged Pro version.</p>
<p>Even more details were released at the end of July by <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-07-06/apple-plans-extreme-sports-watch-with-larger-screen-metal-case">Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman</a>. Check out all the details in our full guide:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://9to5mac.com/2022/07/26/apple-watch-pro-2/">Apple Watch Pro: Everything we know so far</a></li>
</ul>
<h2>Apple Watch Series 8 release date wrap-up</h2>
<p><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1659696593.0775.jpeg" alt="" width="2504" height="1400"></p>
<p>Apple Watch Series 8 is shaping up to be a big upgrade with the possibility of getting its biggest screen yet, new health features, everything coming with watchOS 9, and the potential for Apple’s first rugged wearable.</p>
<p>What are you most excited about with Apple Watch Series 8? Share your thoughts in the comments!</p>
<p>And if you’re curious about how Apple Watch Series 7 compares to the rest of the lineup, check out our comparison:</p>

    description => string (3025) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">Obesity is one of the major health concerns t...
    $value[33]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">Obesity is one of the major health concerns that has been highlighted in the last few years in India. While <a href="https://www.news18.com/india/">India</a> was more burdened with under-nutrition, NFHS 5 shows that India is not far behind in obesity. According to NFHS 5, the obesity rate in both adults and children has increased over the years. In the last five years, obesity has increased by 4 per cent in both men and women in India. While it was 2.1 per cent in NFHS 4, the obesity in children has grown to 3.4 per cent in NFHS 5. This has a rose concern in the nation as you might also be suffering from obesity.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">Let’s take a look at some of the easy prevention tips which can help prevent obesity in both kids and adults.</p>
<p class="story_para_1"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655806532.054.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="608"></p>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3">In order to have proper physical and cognitive development, an infant should be breastfed exclusively for the first six months. They should not be given anything beyond mother’s milk, not even water for this period. Mother’s milk builds the immune system as well as fulfils their nutritional needs.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5231467_4_17"> </div>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4"><strong>No market-based products for complementary feeding</strong></p>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">When starting complementary feeding after six months, the kids should only be given home-cooked fresh food. Parents should avoid giving them biscuits, juices, colas and so on as they have high sugar and salt content which leads to obesity.</p>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6"><strong>Encourage eating only when hungry</strong></p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7">If you like to much all the time, your kid will adopt that habit from you. You should avoid overacting too and tell your kids to do that. Make them eat food only when they are hungry not when they want to munch something.</p>
<h4>To prevent obesity in adults</h4>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8"><strong>Limit processed foods</strong></p>
<p id="9" class="story_para_9">Processed foods have unhealthy fats and are harmful to the health as they increase weight. They have high levels of salt and sugar which aid no nutrition and only taste.</p>
<p id="10" class="story_para_10"><strong>Eat more vegetables and fruits</strong></p>
<p id="11" class="story_para_11">Vegetables and fruits are healthy, make you feel full, and even give your body a lot of nutrition. Having plenty of fruits and vegetables in your diet prevents you from munching on unhealthy snacks.</p>
<p id="12" class="story_para_12"><strong>Exercise</strong></p>
<p id="13" class="story_para_13">This is highly important. Despite eating healthy, you might end up gaining weight if you are not doing any exercise. One has to indulge in some kind of physical activity in order to maintain a healthy weight.</p>

    description => string (2225) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">From celebrities to commoners, everyone is cr...
    $value[34]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">From celebrities to commoners, everyone is crazy about working out. People are so into it that missing gym even for a day makes them feel as if they have sinned. You can spot many people in the gym who are in their teenage years. More than a fitness regimen, going to the gym has become a fashion trend. Kids as young as 14-15 are working out in the gym, but is it ideal for young people to go to the gym? If not, then what is the right age of going to the gym, Let’s find out.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">When to join the gym?</p>
<p class="story_para_1"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655805350.5329.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="720"></p>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2">Our body goes through several changes as it ages. Our muscles continue to grow larger and stronger in our teen years. At the age of 17-18, our body becomes mature and strong enough to bear the results of vigorous exercises at the gym. Growing up, our body also faces a lot of hormonal changes and we need good nutrition to cope with all the changes that our body goes through.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-4857785_2_8"> </div>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3">So, stressing our body at the gym cannot be an ideal choice and it also affects our physical growth. We can do other physical activities to keep our body fit such as running, swimming, any sort of sports, yoga, and more. It is not necessary that only working out in a gym would provide our body with the needed physical workout. It is suggested that we keep a distance from weighted squats and deadlifts till 17-18.</p>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4">After this age, our body becomes mature enough to go through the physical change that a heavy workout in the gym would bring. Make sure that you are under the supervision of a professional trainer who is well-qualified. Start from the basics and then move on to the right techniques and safe movements.</p>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">Make sure to update your diet and calories intake according to your gym routine.</p>
<p class="story_para_5"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655805391.2353.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="720"></p>

    description => string (2369) "<p>Are you someone who loves putting on make-up but gets no time to glam up ...
    $value[35]['description']
    <p>Are you someone who loves putting on make-up but gets no time to glam up your look? Do you leave early for work due to which you don’t indulge in the hassle of having the multi-layer make-up? If your answer is yes, then we are here with a new trend which is getting viral on the internet- one layer makeup! Yes, you read that right. One layer or a single layer of make-up involves putting foundation, concealer, and contour all at once. Let’s take a look at the steps of pulling out the single-layer make-up look with perfection.</p>
<p><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655804147.0007.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="612"></p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1"><strong>Step 1</strong> – Start by using your foundation. Apply it in dots all over your face.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5385325_2_11"> </div>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2"><strong>Step 2</strong> – Now, take your concealer and use it on the places you want to cover like dark circles or other pigmented spots.</p>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3"><strong>Step 3</strong> – Next, use a highlighter and put dots on your forehead, nose, and chin for a glam look.</p>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4"><strong>Step 4</strong> – It’s time to contour and give a shape to your face. Use a contour pencil or a good bronzer to draw lines on your face for a sharp look.</p>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5"><strong>Step 5</strong> – Use a liquid blush and tap it on your cheekbones. While it might look funny at the moment, you’ll see the magic in some time.</p>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6"><strong>Step 6</strong> – Now, it is time to blend it all. Take a brush and start blending your foundation in a downward motion.</p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7"><strong>Step 7</strong> – Next, blend your contour, highlighter and at last your blush for the pink cheeks.</p>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8">Once, everything is blended properly, you’ll notice a well-finished look. The make-up trend is one of the most viral ones this year and every influencer is giving it a try. So, what are you waiting for, go take out your make-up palette and get ready to see the magic!</p>
<p class="story_para_8"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655804173.6089.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="720"></p>

    description => string (2335) "<p>If you are rigorously working out in order to lose weight, you must remem...
    $value[36]['description']
    <p>If you are rigorously working out in order to lose weight, you must remember that your diet plays an equally essential role in ensuring that you lose extra fat. So, for your diet to show its effect, there are certain food combinations that one should avoid consuming together. According to numerous nutritionists and Ayurveda experts, certain food combinations can clog digestive channels and prevent your body from absorbing essential nutrients that help you in weight loss.</p>
<p><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655803689.2653.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="718"></p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1"><strong>As per a report by Healthline, these are some harmful food combinations you should avoid if you’re on a weight loss journey.</strong></p>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2"></p>
<ol class="listOncontentArticle">
<li>When you combine carbohydrate and protein, like meat with potatoes or bread, the protein putrefies and the carbohydrate ferments, this causes bloating, acidity, and flatulence. It is advised that you eat complementary combinations such as beans and rice, which is a suitable gastronomical combination.</li>
<li>Tea-time is often signified by certain snacks on the set menu. However, this could be a stumbling block in your weight-loss journey. Tea contains caffeine, which, when consumed with other food items can obstruct iron absorption, causing bloating.</li>
<li>Chapati, veggies, and rice make up a classic Indian lunch or dinner. However, Chapati and Rice are two types of hefty grains that have a high GI value. They should never be consumed simultaneously.</li>
<li>With a hefty lunch, your stomach is already full. So, do not put too much pressure on it by consuming sugary desserts right after. Allow for some time between your lunch and the dessert.</li>
<li>Combining foods with various digestion enzymes, according to health experts, will cause harmful effects on your gut. Foods that require various digestive speeds should also be avoided. This could jeopardize your intestinal health and your weight loss plan can be disturbed.</li>
<li>Carbs and sugar are another deadly combination that should not be consumed together. For example, having a bag of potato chips with an aerated drink like Coca-Cola will only hamper your weight loss journey.</li>
</ol>

    description => UTF-8 string (13124) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">Today, the world is observing International D...
    $value[37]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">Today, the world is observing International Day of Yoga 2022 to raise awareness about the health and well-being advantages of yoga. The International Yoga Day also educates about Yoga, which started thousands of years ago in India. It is a collection of physical, mental, and spiritual disciplines that have become popular as a way of life in the modern day. When we hear the word “yoga," we think of exercises that help us stretch or keep our bodies flexible. This western-inspired, transmogrified and neo form of yoga has made us forget our ancient roots in it.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">The word “yoga" originates from the Sanskrit root verb “yuj", which means “to unite with”. Yoga is the process through which we unite with Parabraḥma and discover the reality of our true self. Thus, it is said that Yoga is the path from jīva (individual) to Śiva (Parabraḥma). To achieve this unification with the higher reality, Guru Patanjali says one must be “Ishvara pranidhāna va", i.e., the practitioner of yoga must have steadfast devotion towards the gods. Bhagwan Shiva is believed to be the first Adi Yogi, or Yogi. It was passed down to his seven disciples, and they spread it throughout the whole world. But we don’t have any records for it as in the ancient period it was written on palm leaves, which we gradually lost over centuries and millennials.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5410723_1_53"> </div>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2">Thus, the actual meaning of yoga is to unite us with nature and the people around us. It helps us remove negative energy from our bodies and, most importantly, from our minds. It gives us more power to concentrate on our work and gives us a lot of positive energy and eternal peace, which helps in improving our physical strength.<img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655788608.8911.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="608"></p>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3">The evidence of Yoga starts from the Bhagavad Gita, in which Bhagwan Krishna explains to Arjun the importance of it “Samatvam Yoga Uchyate," i.e. Yoga is a balanced state. Yoga strives for oneness between man and nature. It balances us and takes us back to our joyous state.</p>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4">There are three more prime Yog’s mentioned in the Bhagavad Gita:</p>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">1) <strong>Bhakti Yog</strong>: As per Gita 15th Chapter, Bhakti Yog leads to Purushottam Bhagwan. The world is described as inverted indestructible Pipal tree whose root is Bhagwan Krishna and branches are Bhagwan Brahma.</p>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6">Whoever knows the elements of the tree right up to its root understands the meaning of it. The branches are the attachments and they need to be cut through the weapon of Vairagya or Detachment. Then one has to search for Parmeshwar where once a person goes, he never returns. As per 10th Chapter, those who realise Parmatma’s Yog Shakti and Vibhuti, he is totally in Bhakti Yog.</p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7">2) <strong>Sankhya Yog</strong>: As per 2nd Chapter on Arjun’s query as to wisdom and actions of wise men, Krishna tells that a knowledgeable person drowns his mind in meditation and totally becomes aloof to sensory vices. He becomes Stithpragya. His detachment is his main armament as he has no desire. Therefore, understanding your true self makes one let go of ego. This philosophy of Gyan is Sankhya Yog.</p>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8">3) <strong>Karma Yog</strong>: As per 2nd chapter philosophy of Karma, Yog is of doing what is right without thinking of the consequences. Emphasis should not be in accruing Karma but should liberate themselves from the consequences of their Karma. Selfless actions or Karma Yog leads you towards the right path of self-realisation.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5410723_9_53"> </div>
<p id="9" class="story_para_9">We can see Yoga words in many ancient Indian scriptures, which are Vedas and Upanishads, like Rig Veda, Atharva Veda, Katha Upanishad, etc, from which some are given below:</p>
<p id="10" class="story_para_10"><strong>Katha Upanishad 2.3.11 </strong></p>
<p id="11" class="story_para_11"><em>तां योगमिति मन्यन्ते स्थिरामिन्द्रियधारणाम् ।</em></p>
<p id="12" class="story_para_12"><em>अप्रमत्तस्तदा भवति योगो हि प्रभवाप्ययौ ॥ ११॥</em></p>
<p id="13" class="story_para_13">This, the firm control of the senses, is what is called yoga. One must then be vigilant; for yoga can be both beneficial and injurious.</p>
<p id="14" class="story_para_14"><strong>Pātanjali yogasutra 1.2</strong></p>
<p id="15" class="story_para_15"><em>योगश्चित्तवृत्तिनिरोधः ॥१.२॥</em></p>
<p id="16" class="story_para_16"><em>योग: , चित्त , वृत्ति , निरोधः ॥</em></p>
<p id="17" class="story_para_17">Meaning Yoga is restraining the mind-stuff (Chitta) from taking various forms (Vrittis).</p>
<p id="18" class="story_para_18"><strong>Pātanjala yogasutra 11.29</strong></p>
<p id="19" class="story_para_19"><em>यमनियमासनप्राणायामप्रत्याहारधारणाध्यानसमाधयोऽष्टावङ्गानि ॥ २.२९॥</em></p>
<p id="20" class="story_para_20"><strong>Meaning</strong>: Yama (control), Niyama (discipline), Sana (postures), Pryama (controlling breath), Pratyhra (withdrawal of senses), Dharan (meditation), Dhyna (identification with the true self), and Samadhi (experiencing the true self, united with the Parabrama) are the eight parts of Yoga.</p>
<p id="21" class="story_para_21">We can also see some evidence from the Indus Valley civilization. We have also found seals which depict the practice of Yoga in that period. It is way back from 2700 BCE, in which we can see people doing Sadhana.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5410723_22_53"> </div>
<p id="22" class="story_para_22">In his Yoga Sutras, known as Raja Yoga, the Father of Yoga, Maharishi Patanjali, explained Yoga to all and its purpose.</p>
<h4>Modern Yoga and the Post-Classical Period</h4>
<p id="23" class="story_para_23">The Classical period lasted till 1700 CE, in which many Yogis like Shri Acharaya Trayas, Shri Adi Shankaracharya, Shri Madhvacharya, Shri Ramanujacharya, Meera Bai, and Purandara Dasa played an important role in the development of Yoga and its culture throughout the world. Shri Adi Shankaracharya devoted his time to practising Jnana Yoga and Raja Yoga and empathised in meditation, which helps in removing negative thoughts.</p>
<p id="24" class="story_para_24">Hatha Yoga, which is still practiced in the current period, was practiced by Tulsidas and Purandara Dasa, who worked on the science of Yoga and introduced physical postures and breathing techniques that were later known as Hatha Yoga.</p>
<p id="25" class="story_para_25">In the late 18th century, Swami Vivekanand ji spread yoga to the world. In 1893, Swami Vivekanand ji, when he visited Chicago, gave a lecture on Yoga, which gave inspiration to all to follow it and practise it.</p>
<p id="26" class="story_para_26">Hatha Yoga became more popular after the 1920s. As time passes away, many people have forgotten the true meaning of yoga, which was practiced in ancient times. The main aim of Yoga was to focus on breathing techniques and free the body, spirit, and mind. Our ancestors knew about the importance of mental hygiene, for which they used to do yoga, so that all unnecessary pollutants from body and soul could be cleaned up. The true meaning of Yoga has been left behind by predecessors as time passes away and no one bothers to know about the real meaning of it.</p>
<p id="27" class="story_para_27">Most important people and yogis in the current era have forgotten the Eight Limbs of Yoga, which were created to help us understand what yoga was all about.</p>
<p class="story_para_27"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655788753.2336.jpeg" alt="" width="1080" height="719"></p>
<h4>The Eight Limbs of Yoga</h4>
<p id="28" class="story_para_28">1. <strong>Yamas </strong>teach us how to treat nature and others around us.</p>
<p id="29" class="story_para_29">a. <strong>Ahimsa</strong> implies that we should treat everyone equally and without discrimination.</p>
<p id="30" class="story_para_30">b. <strong>Satya</strong> means what we have learnt, what we hear, what we see, and what we assume should be expressed in the same way without any manipulation.</p>
<p id="31" class="story_para_31">c. <strong>Asteya</strong> means we should not take anything without permission from Swami, never ask someone to do it, and we should never think about it.</p>
<p id="32" class="story_para_32">d. <strong>Brahmacharya</strong> means that we should control our minds and senses, which will help us control our physical strength, and that we should read scriptures and share them with others.</p>
<p id="33" class="story_para_33">e. <strong>Aparigraha</strong> means we should control our greedy thoughts, which is the mother of all evils, and never think about it.</p>
<p id="34" class="story_para_34">2. <strong>Niyamas</strong> help us practice self-discipline</p>
<p id="35" class="story_para_35">a. <strong>Shudhi</strong>, which means self-cleanliness, is of two types. One is Brahma Shudhi, which teaches us to keep our bodies, clothes, utensils, places clean. Another is Aantrik Shudhi, which teaches us to clean our thoughts by reading scriptures, doing satsang.</p>
<p id="36" class="story_para_36">b. <strong>Santosh</strong> means that we should be content with what we have and not demand more.</p>
<p id="37" class="story_para_37">c. <strong>Taap</strong>, while doing all these things, we should not think about anything else, like hot or cold, hunger or thirsty, gain or loss, respect or disrespect. We should overcome all this.</p>
<p id="38" class="story_para_38">d. <strong>Svadhyaya</strong> means we should read scriptures, which lead to Moksha and reside in ‘Om’ Mantra and all other Mantras and practice meditation.</p>
<p id="39" class="story_para_39">e. <strong>Ishvarapranidhana</strong> means we should dedicate all our body, knowledge, senses, power towards Bhagwan so that we get Moksha and not use it for other purposes.</p>
<p id="40" class="story_para_40">3. <strong>Asana</strong> means how we should practice our yoga. We should keep our bodies steady while meditating, just like Padmasana.</p>
<p id="41" class="story_para_41">4. <strong>Pranayam</strong> means when we sit in a steady position and control our senses and start doing breathing exercises, which is like inhaling for 1 second, holding your breath for 4 seconds, and then exhaling for 2 seconds, is called Pranayam.</p>
<p id="42" class="story_para_42">5. <strong>Pratyahara</strong> means sense withdrawal. It teaches us ultimate peacefulness. When we cut our senses off from the external world, we can dive within ourselves to discover the vast universe that lies inside.</p>
<p id="43" class="story_para_43">6. <strong>Dharna</strong> means that while meditating, we should focus solely on one thing and allow nothing else to enter our minds. This will help us concentrate on a single goal and keep us from distraction.</p>
<p id="44" class="story_para_44">7. <strong>Dhyan</strong> means meditation. It’s a process in which we should only think about Bhagwan and nothing else. And try to speak the mantras. We should not think about anything else. We can improve our chances of experiencing meditation by sitting in a quiet space and using pranayama, pratyahara, and dharana in unison.</p>
<p id="45" class="story_para_45">8. <strong>Samadhi</strong> means enlightenment. When we complete all the above steps and get to know about the real power inside us and forget about everything else, we can attain Samadhi.</p>
<p id="46" class="story_para_46">This is all about yoga, which we should all practice because it is based on meaningful lessons for the betterment of life and not just for entertainment or a fit body. It’s all about how to attain enlightenment, or Samadhi, guiding us on how to connect with people around us, how to connect with Ishvar, and how to attain Moksha.</p>
<p id="47" class="story_para_47">In current times, we have witnessed many benefits of Yoga. In the Covid-19 pandemic, people started doing more yoga than anything else and started believing in more Santana Dharma and the importance of it in our lives. But we should not forget the real power and meaning of it, for which it was started by our Gurus. We should try to do all the points of Yoga and have enlightenment in our lives and all those around us.<img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655788704.2054.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="719"></p>

    description => string (3994) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">Defending champion France lost its Nations Le...
    $value[38]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">Defending champion France lost its Nations League title and faced the dim prospect of relegation after losing at home to Croatia 1-0 on Monday.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">Meanwhile, while their group leader Denmark beat Austria 2-0 to boost its Final Four bid.</p>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2">Denmark has nine points, two more than second-placed Croatia with only the group winner going through. Austria was third with four points and rock-bottom France had two after their fourth game without a win. The team in last place is relegated.</p>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3">Croatia scored with a fifth-minute penalty from standout midfielder Luka Modric at the Stade de France. It is where he played so commandingly for Champions League winner Real Madrid in the final just over two weeks ago, and he belied his advancing years with a display full of astute passing and clever movement into space.</p>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4">Croatia’s fans chanted, “Luka, Luka,” to their inspirational captain as he gave them a thumbs up after the game.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5365885_4_21"> </div>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">In Copenhagen, wide forwards Jonas Older Wind and Andreas Skov Olsen got Denmark’s goals in the first half.</p>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6">Croatia hosts Denmark in a table-topping clash on Sept. 22.</p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7">France coach Didier Deschamps finally dropped first-choice forward Antoine Griezmann, who has not scored for the team since early January, and instead selected Christopher Nkunku in attack alongside Karim Benzema and Kylian Mbappe.</p>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8">It was Nkunku’s astute pass which set up Mbappe’s late equalizer in a 1-1 draw in Austria on Friday.</p>
<p id="9" class="story_para_9">Perhaps to rouse the players, the band stopped playing at the start of the “La Marseillaise” and most of the 77,400 crowd at Stade de France sang it A cappella style.</p>
<p id="10" class="story_para_10">The home fans fell quiet when Croatia won a penalty after Ibrahima Konate fouled Josip Brekalo for the penalty.</p>
<p id="11" class="story_para_11">Mike Maignan started in goal ahead of long-standing No. 1 Hugo Lloris and guessed the right way but he could not stop Modric’s powerful strike arrowing into the left corner.</p>
<p id="12" class="story_para_12">France beat Croatia 4-2 in the 2018 <a href="https://www.news18.com/world/">World</a> Cup final but the Croats were better on the night against a French side lacking intensity in midfield. Led by the craft of 36-year-old Modric, Croatia’s midfield expertly cut the supply line to star forwards Benzema and Mbappe.</p>
<p id="13" class="story_para_13">Benzema went close midway through the second half as France found more space and Griezmann received a loud ovation when he came on for the last 10 minutes.</p>
<p id="14" class="story_para_14">Benzema had an injury-time header well saved by goalkeeper Ivica Ivusic as French hopes evaporated.</p>
<p id="15" class="story_para_15">A youth ran onto the field at the final whistle and sprinted to Benzema, forcing security to intervene, but Benzema hugged the boy, removed his jersey and handed it to him.</p>
<p class="story_para_15"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655787087.1362.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="624"></p>
<p id="16" class="story_para_16"><strong>OTHER GAMES</strong></p>
<p id="17" class="story_para_17">In League B, Group 2 leader Israel twice came from behind to draw with Iceland 2-2.</p>
<p id="18" class="story_para_18">In League C, Kazakhstan took control of Group 3 after beating Slovakia 2-1 at home to move onto 10 points, four ahead of the Slovaks in the second spot.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5365885_18_21"> </div>
<p id="19" class="story_para_19">Azerbaijan beat Belarus 2-0 at home in the other game.</p>

    description => string (3214) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">Rio de Janeiro Olympics gold medalist Mo...
    $value[39]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">Rio de Janeiro Olympics gold medalist Monica Puig announced her retirement from professional tennis at age 28 via a post on social media Monday.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">Puig became the first athlete to win gold for Puerto Rico in any sport at an Olympics with her women’s singles triumph in 2016. She also was the first woman representing her country to earn an Olympic medal of any colour.</p>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2">“After a tough 3-year fight with injuries and 4 surgeries, my body had enough,” Puig wrote Monday. “This decision isn’t an easy one because I would’ve loved to retire on my own terms, but sometimes life has other plans and we have to open new doors that lead to exciting possibilities.”</p>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3">Puig said she will work for ESPN and will be “exploring consulting roles for young, up and coming tennis players, as well as with programs and academies.”</p>
<p class="story_para_3"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655786026.117.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="608"></p>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4">She leaves the tennis tour with a career record of 303-215, one WTA singles title in addition to her Summer Games victory, a career-best ranking of No. 27 and more than $3.5 million in prize money.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5366029_4_13"> </div>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">Puig stopped playing in the first set of what would be her final tournament match last month in France against Fiona Ferro. She played in one other official match this season, at the Madrid Open, losing to Australian Open runner-up Danielle Collins.</p>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6">Otherwise, Puig had not competed since a first-round loss at the French Open in October 2020.</p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7">She announced in June 2021 that she would need to sit out the Tokyo Olympics and the rest of last season after having surgery on her right shoulder. That was her second operation to repair her rotator cuff and biceps tendon.</p>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8">Puig also had surgery on her right elbow in December 2019.</p>
<p id="9" class="story_para_9">At the Rio Olympics, Puig was unseeded and ranked 34th, but she capped a run of surprising results by beating three-time Grand Slam champion Angelique Kerber 6-4, 4-6, 6-1 in the final. That followed wins against two other major champions, Petra Kvitova and Garbiñe Muguruza. Puig was the first unseeded woman to win the singles title since tennis returned to the Olympics in 1988.</p>
<p id="10" class="story_para_10">Puig’s best showing at a Grand Slam tournament was getting to the fourth round of Wimbledon as a teenager in 2013.</p>
<p id="11" class="story_para_11">“Over the past 28 years of my life, tennis has been my constant. It has given me some of the most thrilling and memorable experiences I could have ever asked for,” Puig wrote Monday. “But, sometimes, good things come to an end.”<img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655786075.1573.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="648"></p>

    description => string (3198) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">Cricket South Africa (CSA) on Monday congratu...
    $value[40]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">Cricket South Africa (CSA) on Monday congratulated their men’s team on drawing the five-match T20I series against India.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">After rain caused the abandonment of last game in Bengaluru on Sunday, the series was drawn at 2-2.</p>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2">South Africa had gained an upper hand quickly in the series, winning matches in New Delhi and Cuttack before losses in Visakhapatnam and Rajkot got <a href="https://www.news18.com/india/">India</a> back in the series. But rain playing spoilsport in Bengaluru meant that the Proteas kept their record intact of not losing a limited-overs series in India since 2011.</p>
<p class="story_para_2">“This was a tough series with a lot of learnings for our team and we are proud of how the Proteas acquitted themselves. With an ICC T20 <a href="https://www.news18.com/world/">World</a> Cup coming up soon, these results bode well for Temba Bavuma and his men. Hearty congratulations to him, coach Mark Boucher and the entire touring party on a good job well done," said Pholetsi Moseki, CSA Chief Executive Officer.</p>
<p class="story_para_2"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655784163.4809.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="810"></p>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">Heinrich Klassen ended as South Africa’s leading run-getter, with 118 runs in three innings while Dwaine Pretorius was leading wicket-taker for the Proteas with five wickets in four innings. Lawson Naidoo, the CSA Board Chairperson, expressed satisfaction at the team’s performance against a strong Indian outfit missing many regular players after <a href="https://www.news18.com/cricketnext/ipl-2022.html">IPL</a> 2022.</p>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6">“Congratulations to the Proteas on an exciting series against India, in difficult and exacting conditions. Back-to-back victories over the talented India team is worthy to celebrate because India possess impressive depth in their system due to the Indian Premier League (IPL), which makes them a dangerous outfit, even when their star players are rested."</p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7"><strong><a href="https://www.news18.com/cricketnext/news/he-put-us-under-pressure-in-the-powerplays-mark-boucher-praises-india-bowler-after-series-ends-2-2-5406493.html">‘He Put us Under Pressure in The Powerplays’: Mark Boucher Praises India Bowler After Series Ends 2-2</a></strong></p>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8">Naidoo further said he looks forward to South Africa’s all-format tour of England before the Men’s T20 World Cup in Australia happens in October-November.</p>
<p id="9" class="story_para_9">“It is pleasing to see the team acquit themselves well in a series where several combinations were fielded, giving all of us watching great hope in our own depth. This truly bodes well for the ICC T20 World Cup in Australia later this year. We also look forward to another exciting white-ball and Test series in England very soon."</p>
<p class="story_para_9"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655784215.5552.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="648"></p>

    description => string (3473) "<p id="0" class="story_para_0">Reigning world champion Fabio Quartararo exte...
    $value[41]['description']
    <p id="0" class="story_para_0">Reigning world champion Fabio Quartararo extended his lead in the overall standings with a commanding performance despite feeling unwell to win the German MotoGP on Sunday.</p>
<p id="1" class="story_para_1">The Yamaha rider dominated in scorching temperatures at the Sachsenring with fellow Frenchman Johann Zarco finishing second and Australia’s Jack Miller third.</p>
<p id="2" class="story_para_2">Quartararo snatched the lead at the first corner away from Francesco Bagnaia, who started in pole position, and never looked back, but later revealed he had suffered with illness all weekend.</p>
<p class="story_para_2"><img src="https://news.wrteam.in/public/images/news/1655730765.9749.jpg" alt="" width="1080" height="730"></p>
<p id="3" class="story_para_3">“I’m tired, I was sick most of the weekend and was coughing during the race, but I am super happy." said Quartararo, whose gamble paid off to use a medium rear tyre rather than a hard one.</p>
<p id="4" class="story_para_4">This is his third win this season and Quartararo claimed back-to-back victories having also won the Catalan MotoGP at the start of June.</p>
<p id="5" class="story_para_5">The Frenchman extended his lead at the top of the overall championships to 34 points over Spanish rider Aleix Espargaro as the Yamaha rider earned the 11th MotoGP victory of his career.</p>
<div class="nw18-dynamic-div-5402629_6_20"> </div>
<p id="6" class="story_para_6">Victory in Saxony means that whatever happens at the Dutch MotoGP at Assen next weekend, Quartararo will keep his lead going into the summer break before the season resumes at Silverstone in August.</p>
<p id="7" class="story_para_7">“I am not thinking of the championship," Quartararo insisted.</p>
<p id="8" class="story_para_8">“I am here to win as many races as possible, maybe by the time it comes to Japan and Thailand (in September and October), I will think about the title itself.</p>
<p id="9" class="story_para_9">“We are going to a track I love at Assen (the Dutch MotoGP) next week."</p>
<p id="10" class="story_para_10">At the halfway point of the season, Quartararo remains on course to win the overall world title for the third straight year as he again left his rivals in his wake in sweltering temperatures.</p>
<p id="11" class="story_para_11">“It was a nightmare," said second-placed Zarco of the conditions, “but I ensured my runners-up spot when I decided to chase down Fabio after Bagnaia crashed.</p>
<p id="12" class="story_para_12">“I battled hard for it, and was exhausted at the end, but it is never easy for me and I just have to tough these races out."</p>
<p id="13" class="story_para_13">Bagnaia, who dominated free practive, crashed out with 27 laps to go, when his rear wheel slid out from under him, ending his hopes of winning the overall world title to his obvious fury.</p>
<p id="14" class="story_para_14">This was the third time the Italian has failed to finish in his last four MotoGP races.</p>
<p id="15" class="story_para_15">Miller put in a brilliant ride to finish third, having nearly crashed on the same bend where Bagnaia exited.</p>
<p id="16" class="story_para_16">“I had an eventful race and nearly crashed," said the Australian.</p>
<p id="17" class="story_para_17">“I was happy with the job I did, I put everything out there."</p>
<p class="story_para_2"> </p>
